channel.title: Pi client help please!
channel.description: Hey i have hybrid pvp source but i like the old graphics from like 474 and 317 liek tht i dont like the new ones. Is it possible to get dif graphics like the character models and hp bars and stuff without switching my sources.... Or anyone no how to edit the models? Or can someone get a client with old graphics for my source hybrid pvp. You will get admin and any items you want on server we have 120 votes name is hehescape 10 players online please help!

item.title: Pi client help please!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

The work that it would take to make an old school 317 (or what you people think is a 317 thats really 377) cache to work with the server considering the item dump in the server has over 1000 different models and items coded in. Your better off getting a frame work or something or just an old delta.

Read full topic
